title: Science Curriculum Design Applying Integrated Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental theories and research methods in the sciences
context.additional_context: Gamified activity environment achievable via smartphones in limited technological settings

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain complex scientific concepts using gamification elements
Learners apply scientific problem-solving strategies with at least 80% accuracy through team-based mission performance
Learners improve self-directed learning engagement by 30% using gamification systems (e.g., experience points, badges, leaderboards)
Learners develop creative science education scenarios reflecting gamification design principles in assessment missions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
